messages.original: Another interceptor missile has been launched from Eilat. Israeli sources again report that the UAV has been intercepted.

Last night, a series of Geran-2 drone strikes were carried on Zaporizhzhia City. At least 14 impacts were recorded in two waves, primarily targeting industrial infrastructure and warehouses.   Ukrainian air defence has become more active in Zaporizhzhia lately.‚Ä¶

Sentinel satellite imagery shows that the factory management building for the Zaporizhzhia Abrasive Plant was heavily damaged by Geran-2 drone strikes during the attacks on September 7. 
Image credit: 
https://t.me/osint_alarm/223

Sentinel satellite imagery shows that the factory management building for the Zaporizhzhia Abrasive Plant was heavily damaged by Geran-2 drone strikes during the attacks on September 7. 
Image credit: 
https://t.me/osint_alarm/223
Another interceptor missile has been launched from Eilat. Israeli sources again report that the UAV has been intercepted.
The drone was not intercepted. Sirens are now sounding in Be'er Ora, southern Israel.
The drone was not intercepted. Sirens are now sounding in Be'er Ora, southern Israel.
The drone has entered Israeli airspace, flying northwest.
A series of Israeli airstrikes targeted the Hermel region, northeastern Lebanon, a short time ago.
A series of Israeli airstrikes targeted the Hermel region, northeastern Lebanon, a short time ago.
The drone has entered Israeli airspace, flying northwest.
The Houthi drone impacted the Ramon Airport area again. It was not intercepted.
The Houthi drone impacted the Ramon Airport area again. It was not intercepted.
It seems to have fallen outside of the airport, impacting an open area. No casualties.

Russia is continuing to prepare for their next large-scale combined missile attack on Ukraine.
Another Tu-95MS strategic bomber redeployed from Olenya Airbase, Murmansk Oblast, to Engels-2 Airbase, Saratov Oblast, to be equipped with Kh-101 cruise missiles. An IL-76MD military transport aircraft also landed at Engels-2 a short time ago. The cargo consists of Kh-101 missiles. 
Additionally, 1 Tu-160 redeployed from Engels-2 Airbase to Ukrainka Airbase, probably to be equipped with missiles.
As of now, at least 2 Tu-95s are known to be equipped with Kh-101 missiles at Olenya, as well as another 2 at Ukrainka. This is on top of 1 Tu-95 and 1 Tu-160 currently in the process of being equipped at Engels-2, and possibly another Tu-160 being equipped at Ukrainka.

Sentinel satellite imagery shows that the factory management building for the Zaporizhzhia Abrasive Plant was heavily damaged by Geran-2 drone strikes during the attacks on September 7.   Image credit: https://t.me/osint_alarm/223
Here are some close-up photos of the Abrasive Plant that was hit in Zaporizhzhia.
Here are some close-up photos of the Abrasive Plant that was hit in Zaporizhzhia.
A series of Israeli airstrikes targeted the Hermel region, northeastern Lebanon, a short time ago.
The IDF claimed that the airstrikes on northeastern Lebanon targeted Hezbollah camps, including ones used by their elite "Radwan" force.
Sirens are again sounding in southern Israel due to the threat of Houthi UAVs. This time in the area of the Rotem Industrial Zone.
Sirens are again sounding in southern Israel due to the threat of Houthi UAVs. This time in the area of the Rotem Industrial Zone.
The UAV is flying west to the Dimona Nuclear Research Centre.
The UAV is flying west to the Dimona Nuclear Research Centre.
Israeli media reports that the UAV fell outside Dimona.
